'''Hank Bauer''' is a patient of Violet's who came into the ER after he was found yelling at a fire hydrant.

==History==
Hank was picked up by paramedics when he was found yelling at a fire hydrant. They brought him to St. Ambrose, where he insisted that people were waiting to hear him speak. They tried to calm him down, but he said he had two knives and would stab everyone in there. Violet ordered haloperidol and talked to Hank. She was able to convince him to take the pills.
